MIKE PENCE NOT RUNNING FOR PRESIDENT Mike Pence Falcone notes: Mike Pence 's appeal among conservatives became even more clear in September when he won a straw poll at the Family Research Council's annual Values Voter Summit, a gathering of social conservatives. Mike Pence , the former chair of the House Republican Conference, received 24 percent of the vote in poll-- two points ahead of Huckabee and eleven points ahead of Romney. In fact, Mike Pence was so popular among those who took the straw poll that he also topped the list of potential GOP vice presidential candidates.
